name: Abiding Grace
text:
At the beginning of your end step, choose one —
• You gain 1 life.
• Return target creature card with mana value 1 from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor:
"Into the smothering dark, Serra spoke a single word: 'Hope.'"
—*Song of All*, canto 2

name: Arcbound Javelineer
text:
{T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Arcbound Javelineer: It deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

name: Arcbound Mouser
text:
Lifelink
Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
flavor: It doesn't purr. It hums.

name: Arcbound Prototype
text: Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
flavor: It flickered to life, saw itself alone, and began to build.

name: Barbed Spike
Blacksmith's Skill
text: Target permanent gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Before he was subjugated by demonic forces, Dakkon was a master smith of unrivaled artistry.

name: Blossoming Calm
text:
You gain hexproof until your next turn. You gain 2 life.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Break Ties
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
Reinforce 1—{W} ({W}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)

name: Caprichrome
text:
Flash
Vigilance
Devour artifact 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of artifacts. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor: It is what it eats.

name: Constable of the Realm
text:
Renown 2 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Constable of the Realm, exile up to one other target nonland permanent until Constable of the Realm leaves the battlefield.

name: Disciple of the Sun
text:
Lifelink
When Disciple of the Sun enters the battlefield, return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Heart of a titan, faith as bright as the dawn.

name: Esper Sentinel
text: Whenever an opponent casts their first noncreature spell each turn, draw a card unless that player pays {X}, where X is Esper Sentinel's power.
flavor: The more Esper changes, the more he refuses to.

name: Fairgrounds Patrol
text: {1}{W}, Exile Fairgrounds Patrol from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: "No signs of any suspicious activity. Yet."

name: Glorious Enforcer
text:
Flying, lifelink
At the beginning of each combat, if you have more life than an opponent, Glorious Enforcer gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor: "You are unworthy of life, but take heart. You have earned a clean death."

name: Guardian Kirin
text:
Flying
Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Guardian Kirin.
flavor:
Followed the kirin
—Ojutai expression meaning
"died a hero's death"

name: Healer's Flock
text: Flying, lifelink
flavor: The sight of a flock overhead is bittersweet. It means many are wounded, but it also means help is on the way.

name: Knighted Myr
text:
{2}{W}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Knighted Myr, it gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor:
"This one fights like a leonin!"
—Jor Kadeen

name: Landscaper Colos
text:
When Landscaper Colos enters the battlefield, put target card from an opponent's graveyard on the bottom of their library.
Basic landcycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Late to Dinner
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor: "I knew you were set in your ways, friend, but even I didn't expect you to keep our engagement, under the circumstances."

name: Lens Flare
text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Lens Flare deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor: The key for surviving a war is never becoming its focus.

name: Marble Gargoyle
text:
Flying
{W}: Marble Gargoyle gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Once past the stony exterior, the meat is exquisite and can be stuffed with thallids or simmered in a broth of manticore venom."
—Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar
*The Underworld Cookbook*

name: Nykthos Paragon
text: Whenever you gain life, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on each creature you control. Do this only once each turn.
flavor: Though Heliod turned against humanity in his hunger for power, the ideals he once championed still stand strong.

name: Out of Time
text:
When Out of Time enters the battlefield, untap all creatures, then those creatures phase out until Out of Time leaves the battlefield. Put a time counter on Out of Time for each creature that phased out this way.
Vanishing (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from this enchantment. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

name: Piercing Rays
text:
Exile target tapped creature.
Forecast — {2}{W}, Reveal Piercing Rays from your hand: Tap target untapped creature. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)
flavor: The forecast calls for pain.

name: Prismatic Ending
text: Converge — Exile target nonland permanent if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
flavor: Right before his demise, he experienced a shattering revelation.

name: Resurgent Belief
text:
Suspend 2—{1}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {1}{W} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Auras with nothing to enchant remain in your graveyard.)

name: Sanctifier en-Vec
text:
Protection from black and from red
When Sanctifier en-Vec enters the battlefield, exile all cards that are black or red from all graveyards.
If a black or red permanent, spell, or card not on the battlefield would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

name: Scour the Desert
text: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create X 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying, where X is the exiled card's toughness.
flavor: Even in the most barren wastelands, every death feeds more life.

name: Search the Premises
text: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor:
"To halt these lurid practices, Geralf must be found and made an example of."
—Inquisitor Delmund

name: Serra's Emissary
text:
Flying
As Serra's Emissary enters the battlefield, choose a card type.
You and creatures you control have protection from the chosen card type.
flavor: Where swords fail, faith transcends.

name: Skyblade's Boon
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.
{2}{W}: Return Skyblade's Boon to its owner's hand. Activate only if Skyblade's Boon is on the battlefield or in your graveyard.

name: Solitude
text:
Flash
Lifelink
When Solitude enters the battlefield, exile up to one other target creature. That creature's controller gains life equal to its power.
Evoke—Exile a white card from your hand.

name: Soul of Migration
text:
Flying
When Soul of Migration enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.
Evoke {3}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Thraben Watcher
text:
Flying, vigilance
Other nontoken creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
flavor:
"Fear not the angels' constant eyes,
E'er on watch from lightless skies;
Eternal vigil we will keep,
Protectors of the Blessed Sleep."

name: Timeless Dragon
text:
Flying
Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
Eternalize {2}{W}{W} ({2}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Dragon with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

name: Unbounded Potential
text:
Choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
• Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Entwine {3}{W} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

name: Aeromoeba
text:
Flying
Discard a card: Switch Aeromoeba's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor: Some clouds heed no wind.

name: Burdened Aerialist
text:
When Burdened Aerialist enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Whenever you sacrifice a token, Burdened Aerialist gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "Curse this glorious golden weight!"

name: Dress Down
text:
Flash
When Dress Down enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Creatures lose all abilities.
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Dress Down.

name: Etherium Spinner
text: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
flavor: "Thopters from a foundry always lack that personal touch."

name: Filigree Attendant
text:
Flying
Filigree Attendant's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control.
flavor:
"The perfect assistant is one that's responsive, dextrous, and capable of reaching all the high shelves."
—Coruk, Esper artificer

name: Floodhound
text: {3}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor: The thief doubled back twice, doused herself with perfume, crossed the ocean, and still woke up with her pursuer close on her heels.

name: Foul Watcher
text:
Flying
When Foul Watcher enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
Delirium — Foul Watcher gets +1/+0 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

name: Fractured Sanity
text:
Each opponent mills fourteen cards.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Fractured Sanity, each opponent mills four cards.
flavor: The body grows stronger under stress. The mind does not.

name: Ghost-Lit Drifter
text:
Flying
{2}{U}: Another target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Channel — {X}{U}, Discard Ghost-Lit Drifter: X target creatures gain flying until end of turn.

name: Hard Evidence
text:
Create a 0/3 blue Crab creature token.
Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor: The investigator felt a pinch on his ankle. When he looked down, something glittered in the sand.

name: Inevitable Betrayal
text:
Suspend 3—{1}{U}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {1}{U}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.

name: Junk Winder
text:
Affinity for tokens (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each token you control.)
Whenever a token enters the battlefield under your control, tap target nonland permanent an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Lose Focus
text:
Replicate {U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor: The spell wavered, caught on the tip of his tongue and at the edge of his awareness.

name: Lucid Dreams
text: Draw X cards, where X is the number of card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor: Never be afraid to look where others can't—or won't.

name: Mental Journey
text:
Draw three cards.
Basic landcycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor: "My wandering mind has always been an asset."

name: Murktide Regent
text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Flying
Murktide Regent enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each instant and sorcery card exiled with it.
Whenever an instant or sorcery card leaves your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Murktide Regent.

name: Mystic Redaction
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
Whenever you discard a card, each opponent mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor: "I'm sorry, but this information is classified."

name: Parcel Myr
text: {2}, Sacrifice Parcel Myr: Draw a card.
flavor:
"Crack it open. Maybe it knows something we can use."
—Kara Vrist, Mirran resistance

name: Phantasmal Dreadmaw
text:
Trample
When Phantasmal Dreadmaw becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor:
"That was perhaps the most terrifying thing I thought I almost saw."
—Captain Lannery Storm

name: Raving Visionary
text:
{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
Delirium — {2}{U}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor: "Fear not, child. Open your eyes and witness Keranos's truth!"

name: Recalibrate
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you've discarded a card this turn, draw a card.
flavor:
"Trial 991: Still encountering issues with accidental aetherization. Maybe if we widen the dimensional matrix to 0.7?"
—Izzet research notes

name: Rise and Shine
text:
Target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 0/0 artifact creature. Put four +1/+1 counters on each artifact that became a creature this way.
Overload {4}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

name: Rishadan Dockhand
text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
{1}, {T}: Tap target land.
flavor: It's not hard to find work in Rishada, so long as you've got a strong back and don't ask too many questions.

name: Said // Done
text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Said // Done
text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

name: Scuttletide
text:
{1}, Discard a card: Create a 0/3 blue Crab creature token.
Delirium — Crabs you control get +1/+1 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor:
"We're going to need more butter."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

name: Shattered Ego
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
{3}{U}{U}: Put enchanted creature into its owner's library third from the top.
flavor:
"You can't even fathom the depths of your own insignificance."
—Geyadrone Dihada

name: So Shiny
text:
Enchant creature
When So Shiny enters the battlefield, if you control a token, tap enchanted creature, then scry 2.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Specimen Collector
text:
When Specimen Collector enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token and a 0/3 blue Crab creature token.
When Specimen Collector dies, create a token that's a copy of target token you control.

name: Steelfin Whale
text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, untap Steelfin Whale.
flavor: It feeds on metal filings suspended in the water, sieving flecks of precious ore through magnetic baleen.

name: Step Through
text:
Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.
Wizardcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Wizard card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor: Doors open both ways.

name: Subtlety
text:
Flash
Flying
When Subtlety enters the battlefield, choose up to one target creature spell or planeswalker spell. Its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
Evoke—Exile a blue card from your hand.

name: Suspend
text: Exile target creature and put two time counters on it. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, they remove a time counter. When the last is removed, they play it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)
flavor: Time moves in mysterious ways.

name: Svyelun of Sea and Sky
text:
Svyelun of Sea and Sky has indestructible as long as you control at least two other Merfolk.
Whenever Svyelun attacks, draw a card.
Other Merfolk you control have ward {1}. (Whenever another Merfolk you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)

name: Sweep the Skies
text: Converge — Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying for each color of mana spent to cast this spell.
flavor: A gleam of refracted light is often the only warning.

name: Thought Monitor
text:
Affinity for artifacts
Flying
When Thought Monitor enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
flavor: It roams the skies over the Quicksilver Sea, alert for any hint of aberrant thought.

name: Tide Shaper
text:
Kicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} as you cast this spell.)
When Tide Shaper enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target land becomes an Island for as long as Tide Shaper remains on the battlefield.
Tide Shaper gets +1/+1 as long as an opponent controls an Island.

name: Vedalken Infiltrator
text:
Vedalken Infiltrator can't be blocked.
Metalcraft — Vedalken Infiltrator gets +1/+0 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor: "An expert always keeps their tools close at hand."

name: Archfiend of Sorrows
text:
Flying
When Archfiend of Sorrows enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Unearth {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Archon of Cruelty
text:
Flying
Whenever Archon of Cruelty enters the battlefield or attacks, target opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker, discards a card, and loses 3 life. You draw a card and gain 3 life.
flavor: Malice spreads on wings of tyranny.

name: Bone Shards
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or discard a card.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor: In the Kathari dumping grounds known as the Boneheaps, its not hard to improvise an offense.

name: Break the Ice
text:
Destroy target land that is snow or could produce {C}.
Overload {4}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

name: Cabal Initiate
text:
Discard a card: Cabal Initiate gains lifelink until end of turn.
Threshold — Cabal Initiate gets +1/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: "Hear our prayers, oh Shadowed One, and bless us in bloody agony."

name: Clattering Augur
text:
Clattering Augur can't block.
When Clattering Augur enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
{2}{B}{B}: Return Clattering Augur from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Damn
text:
Destroy target creature. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
Overload {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

name: Dauthi Voidwalker
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, instead exile it with a void counter on it.
{T}, Sacrifice Dauthi Voidwalker: Choose an exiled card an opponent owns with a void counter on it. You may play it this turn without paying its mana cost.

name: Discerning Taste
text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You gain life equal to the greatest power among creature cards put into your graveyard this way.
flavor: "Everyone loves a dash of crushed pixie . . . except the pixie."

name: Echoing Return
text: Return target creature card and all other cards with the same name as that card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: A single ambition unleashes a legion of horrors.

name: Feast of Sanity
text: Whenever you discard a card, Feast of Sanity deals 1 damage to any target and you gain 1 life.
flavor: The tastiest morsels are found in the mazes of the mind.

name: Flay Essence
text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain life equal to the number of counters on it.
flavor:
"Your argument as to why I should spare you lacked substance. Now, so do you."
—Geyadrone Dihada

name: Gilt-Blade Prowler
text: {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card. Activate only if you've discarded a card this turn.
flavor:
"Let's just say my people are in the business of capital acquisition and intellectual property speculation."
—Er-Miral

name: Grief
text:
Menace
When Grief enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Evoke—Exile a black card from your hand.

name: Hell Mongrel
text:
Discard a card: Hell Mongrel gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor: It feeds on shadows, fear, and blood.

name: Kitchen Imp
text:
Flying, haste
Madness {B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor: "Order up! Ooze aspic and jellied anurid eyes!"

name: Legion Vanguard
text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Legion Vanguard explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor: It takes guts to be a trailblazer.

name: Loathsome Curator
text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
Menace
When Loathsome Curator exploits a creature, destroy target creature you don't control with mana value 3 or less.
flavor: She collects only the choicest of deaths.

name: Magus of the Bridge
text:
Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, exile Magus of the Bridge.
flavor: "The dead know their place."

name: Necrogoyf
text:
Necrogoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player discards a card.
Madness {1}{B}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Necromancer's Familiar
text:
Flying
Hellbent — Necromancer's Familiar has lifelink as long as you have no cards in hand.
{B}, Discard a card: Necromancer's Familiar gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

name: Nested Shambler
text: When Nested Shambler dies, create X tapped 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens, where X is Nested Shambler's power.
flavor: Home is where the heart was.

name: Persist
text: Return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.
flavor: In the tight-knit doun of Mistmeadow, death is less important than duty.

name: Profane Tutor
text:
Suspend 2—{1}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {1}{B} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Radiant Epicure
text: Converge — When Radiant Epicure enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
flavor: Taste is not a sensation for the tongue alone.

name: Sinister Starfish
text: {T}: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor:
"Throw that one back. I don't like how it's looking at me."
—Netos, Meletian fisherman
